p: The nude, amino-functionalized, and GA-activated magnetic carriers have been previously characterized using Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) and by transmission (TEM) and scanning electron microscopy (SEM), confirming also that the magnetic properties of the carrier were maintained after immobilization [31,45]. Figure 2 displays the data of the different techniques used for characterization of the novel G1 non-magnetic carrier.
